<title level="1" right="Trait">[Drug](/Traits.aspx?ID=261)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 251</row>

An item with this trait is a drug, a [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) that conveys short-term benefits in addition to harmful side effects and long-term consequences. Each time a creature uses a given drug it must also attempt a saving throw against [addiction](/Diseases.aspx?ID=15) to that drug.
